entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
